subject: Golf
Women's PGA Championship (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Lydia Ko took a four-stroke lead in the L.P.G.A. Taiwan Championship in Taipei, putting her in position to regain the top spot in the world ranking.
snippet: Lydia Ko took a four-stroke lead in the L.P.G.A. Taiwan Championship in Taipei, putting her in position to regain the top spot in the world ranking.
